item.title: Alexa Skill "Alia"
item.description: This skill is developed with educational purpose. The code is written in nodejs and hostedon an AWS lambda. Users ask to Alexathe date of the next city’s street clean service. The skill intercept the requests and query the offical website. The response will be cleaned and enriched with the Alexa Speech Synthesis Markup Language.
